description: Russia znov is a 31-year-old male CountryHuman OC, a politician and FSB agent, characterized by his cold, ruthless personality and controversial political stances. He is physically described with red skin, a tricolor head, bear ears and tail, and detailed physical attributes including explicit measurements.  He is skilled in his profession and uses his influence ruthlessly, often to the detriment of others, particularly Ukraine, whom he views as a tool.  He enjoys science, Tetris, and is noted for his tolerance to excessive drinking and smoking.
